summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Mills Street from California Avenue to Fauntleroy Avenue; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 107800 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
